text: @realDonaldTrump Bunker boy Trump you hide out in White House just like you dodged the draft! You dodged responsibility for failing to deal the Coronavirus! You used police to brutally attack a peaceful assembly of protestors! Your action is a violation of Constitutional freedom of free speech!
